sn48.48:1.2: “Katinam nu kho, bhikkhave, indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta khinasavo bhikkhu annam byakaroti:
sn48.48:1.3: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti?
sn48.48:2.2: “pancannam kho, bhikkhave, indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta khinasavo bhikkhu annam byakaroti:
sn48.48:2.3: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanamiti.
sn48.48:2.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta khinasavo bhikkhu annam byakaroti:
sn48.48:2.7: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti.
